title: EPIC Recommends Privacy-Protective Age Assurance Standards in Comments to the California DOJ
summary: The Electronic Privacy Information Center (EPIC) has submitted recommendations to the California Department of Justice advocating for robust privacy protections in age assurance standards. Their comments emphasize the importance of minimizing data collection and employing privacy-preserving technologies to verify age without compromising users' personal information. EPIC stresses that any age verification system should adhere to principles such as data minimization, security, and transparency to protect individuals' privacy, particularly for children and adolescents.
